file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-00-02-02 - NOSE LANDING GEAR DOORS SAFETY PIN - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NOSE LANDING GEAR DOORS SAFETY PIN - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to install and remove the safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLE- ALL 32-00-02-910-801-A NOID VALVE - INSTALLATION AND RE- MOVAL EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-00-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL A. General (1) The safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve must be installed when the aircraft is parked and during maintenance procedures. (2) When not in use the safety pin is kept in a recess of the aft console, behind the pilot seat. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 114 114CR Forward fuselage I - RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Nose hydraulic component door 114CR I. Preparation (Figure 201) SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that hydraulic system No. 1 is depressurized (I.E. engine No. 1 stopped and electrical motor-driven pump No. 1 turned off). (2) Control the rudder to the left and to the right sides until the pressure of the hydraulic system shows zero PSI on the EICAS display. (3) Open access door 114CR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 910-801-A/200 32-00-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Install (Figure 201) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Manually push the SPOOL ACTUATING PIN. Refer to figure 201. (2) Install the safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve. Refer to figure 201. (3) Make sure that the red REMOVE-BEFORE-FLIGHT streamer is clearly in view. K. Removal (Figure 201) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve. Refer to figure 201. (2) Keep the pin in the recess of the aft console, behind the pilot seat. L. Follow-on (Figure 201) SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close hydraulic compartment door 114CR. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 910-801-A/200 32-00-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
